hymn.title: Jesus' love is sweet and wonderful

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus' love is sweet and won -- der -- ful, Je -- sus' love is sweet and won -- der -- ful, Je -- sus' love is sweet and won -- der -- ful, Oh, won -- der -- ful love!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus' love is sweet and wonderful, Jesus' love is sweet and wonderful, Jesus' love is sweet and wonderful, Oh, wonderful love!
So high, you can't get over it. So low, you can't get under it. So wide, you can't get around it. Oh, wonderful love!
